original_text: But you should not be like that. Instead, the person who wants to be great among you must become like your servant.
korean_text: 너희 중에는 그렇지 않을지니 너희 중에 누구든지 크고자 하는 자는 너희를 섬기는 자가 되고

sentences.original_text: But you should not be like that.
Instead, the person who wants to be great
among you must become like your servant.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중에서 너희의 종과 같이 되어야 한다.
